Most Important Person: The woman in the center of the image

Explanation: replace the dark headwrap with a brightly colored, childish headband with bows or cartoon characters.
make the woman lean slightly against the table, with one hand casually in her pocket and a bored expression on her face.
Make the woman stand up straight with shoulders pulled back. Make her have a wide smile and look directly into the camera.
Lower the woman's head slightly, avert her eyes downwards, and make her mouth look downturned.
Add paint smudges on the woman's face and clothes. Make her hands look clumsy and covered with paint.
replace all the ceramic pieces on the table with modern art supplies like spray paint cans, sculpting tools, and abstract artwork.
